news.description: It's only the seventh-largest metro area in the United States. And it doesn't even crack the top 40 in metro areas worldwide.But once again, Atlanta can boast of having the world's busiest airport for passenger
news.name: It's not one of the world's biggest cities, but has the busiest airport. Here's why

news.description: $10,000 per day contempt fines against Trump begin Tuesday, NY judge rules. Senate report details 'ongoing mistreatment' of service members in privatized military housing
news.name: Supreme Court examines Biden's power to set US immigration policy in 'Remain in Mexico' challenge
